column4: hey guys i was wondering if you could point me towards a really easy cross platform way of transferring files via the internet..?? i want to transfer files from my father's machine to mine and vice versa...
yeah, but my father uses windows and i use ubuntu, actually he uses 2 machines, and one is windows...
if the machines where physically here i would just network them, but
there is woof (commandline only, we're working on a gui version)
